maxItems.description: Limit of home detail pages to be scraped

simple.description: Return only a subset of possible result attributes.

startUrls.description: List of URLs that will be crawled.

zpids.description: List of ZPIDs that will be scraped.

zipcodes.description: List of zipcodes that will be scraped. Notice that this can take a lot of time to complete!

maxLevel.description: Maximum map splitting level. The bigger number is set, the longer the scrape will take

minDate.description: Oldest date allowed in results. Can use literal dates, such as YYYY-MM-DD or relative ones, like 3 hours, 1 month, 2 days, today or yesterday

maxDate.description: Newest date allowed in results. Can use literal dates, such as YYYY-MM-DD or relative ones, like 3 hours, 1 month, 2 days, today or yesterday

includeRelaxedResults.description: Setting this option might give results close but outside to the original city / county / state.

maxRetries.description: How many retries until the scraper should give up

maxConcurrency.description: How many requests can be running simultaneously

extendOutputFunction.description: Extend the output item to contain more fields. The raw data is present in the 'data' variable.

extendScraperFunction.description: Advanced function that allows you to extend the default scraper functionality, allowing you to manually perform actions on the page

customData.description: Any data that you want to have available inside the Extend Output/Scraper Function

rawOutput.description: Output the results without any filtering or formatting. It's recommended to leave this option unchecked.
